Report.name: 2019 Knowledge Translation Competition Intent to Apply

ReportSection.name: Intent To Apply
ReportSection.title: 2019 Knowledge Translation Competition Intent to Apply
ReportSection.ReportItem:
• All sections of this document must be completed. The document must be written in English.
  • The Intent to Apply must be completed using the online platform, Forum, by Monday, January 14, 2019 – 5 pm ET
  • The Intent to Apply will be adjudicated based on the following criteria:
    • Alignment with CFN KT competition priorities
    • Evidence base to support the importance of the endeavour and potential for improvement in the setting
    • Feasibility of the implementation plan design and methods
    • Involvement of appropriate stakeholders and engagement of appropriate partnerships
    • Potential reach and significance of impact of the proposal
  • Only top-rated projects will be invited to submit a full Application. Invitations to submit a full Application will be sent by the end of January 2019.
  • The Project Leader, other Principal Investigators and Co-Investigators cannot be changed, nor new team members added after this document has been submitted to CFN. Visit CFN’s website for project team role definitions: https://www.cfn-nce.ca/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/cfn-project-team-roles-2016-07-07.pdf
Information Required Enter information in this column

Title of KT Proposal
(Maximum 15 words; appropriate for lay audience)
{$item}

Term of KT Proposal
(Maximum 18 months) {$item}
Funding Requested from CFN {$item}

ReportSection.ReportItem: Co-Investigators {$item}

ReportItem.labels: Company/Institution Name|Contact - First Name|Contact - Last Name|Title|Email Address|Contribution Amount($)

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Partnerships
List current identified and potential partners for your KT Proposal and provide the (estimated) amount of cash or in-kind contribution they will be providing. Additional partners can be added in the final proposal. {$item}

Keywords
(Max. 10 words that describe Proposal (e.g. Medline headings) {$item}

Non-Confidential Project Summary Please describe the evidence that supports your KT Proposal
  • Describe the relevant knowledge creation and synthesis that is completed to-date.
  • Identify the gap(s) between evidence and implementation (e.g., care gap, quality gap).
 {$item}

Please summarize the objective(s) of your KT Proposal
  • Include output or outcomes to be achieved.
 {$item}

Please describe your proposed implementation plan
  • Describe the proposed design and methods.
  • Describe the involvement of knowledge users, decision makers, researchers, and partnering organizations. Include timeline and milestones.
 {$item}

Please describe the potential impact of your KT Proposal
  • Describe how your KT Proposal will generate, transfer, and/or apply new knowledge.
  • Describe the anticipated reach and significance of impact of your proposal.
 {$item}

ReportItem.options: Enhancing integrated models of care to improve frailty outcomes.|Strategies for improving functional outcomes in older adults living with frailty.

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Please highlight only one priority that your application will address.
(Select the best fit with your application) {$item}

Please indicate if your application is eligible for funding from partner organization(s)
Select all that apply {$item} NOTE: To be eligible for NBHRF partner funds, the PIs must be from an institution in New Brunswick eligible for Tri-Council funding AND all project funds must be spent within New Brunswick.

ReportItem.options: Matching care to values|Empowering, engaging and supporting patients and their families/caregivers|Improving clinical outcomes|Improving care across the continuum

ReportSection.ReportItem:
CFN Research Theme
Indicate ONE strategic objective that best aligns with your KT Proposal {$item}

ReportItem.options: Improving end-of-life care/advance care planning|Improving acute/critical care|Optimizing community/residential care|Optimizing transitions of care

ReportSection.ReportItem:
CFN Research Theme
Indicate ONE research theme that best aligns with your KT Proposal {$item}
NATIONAL Scientific Reviewers - Please provide details for a minimum of 3 non-conflicted reviewers that we may contact to review your proposal. National Reviewers {$item}
INTERNATIONAL Scientific Reviewers - Please provide details for a minimum of 3 non-conflicted reviewers that we may contact to review your proposal. International Reviewers {$item}

ReportSection.name: Review
ReportSection.ReportItem: {$item}

ReportItemSet.if: {or({<({getArrayCount(RP_KT_APPLICATION, INTENT, NATIONAL, 0, {$user_id}, 0, national)}, 3)}, {<({getArrayCount(RP_KT_APPLICATION, INTENT, INTERNATIONAL, 0, {$user_id}, 0, international)}, 3)})}
ReportItemSet.ReportItem: You must provide 3 national and international reviewers

ReportItemSet.if: {and({==({getArrayCount(RP_KT_APPLICATION, INTENT, NATIONAL, 0, {$user_id}, 0, national)}, 3)}, {==({getArrayCount(RP_KT_APPLICATION, INTENT, INTERNATIONAL, 0, {$user_id}, 0, international)}, 3)})}
